name: Rune of the dice
description:
In RuneOfTheDice you are a rune caster trying to deal with doomed souls returning from the Underworld. To achieve that you need to solve puzzles given by each ghost and get a proper rune using magical rune pouch and rune merging bowls.

Tips and Tricks:

  • At the beginning of the game you have to shake the pouch to get the runes.
  • Then transform them to match ghost’s.
  • To combine the runes, put them into round bowls. One of them will throw out the intersection of the symbols, the other will throw their union.
  • Throwing proper runes into the fire satisfies ghost beyond measure.
  • When you make a mistake, the ghost can take one of your runes.
  • The game is over when you run out of runes.
  • Share with us your best score!

GL&HF 👻
